name: It Came From The Waves
description:
"It Came From The Waves" is an asymmetrical local multiplayer game for the HTC Vive, where one player in the Vive plays as a monster attacking the city, and two other players playing on PC fly airplanes trying to kill the monster.

This prototype was made as part of the 2017 global game jam.

CONTROLS

Vive
Trigger Grab and throw trees and cars

PC player 1
WASD flight controls
Left Shift Accelerate
Space Shoot

PC Player 2
Arrow Keys flight controls
Right Shift Accelerate
Left Control Shoot
